content.rendered:
Directed by Sailesh Kolanu

Written by Girish Kohli. Sailesh Kolanu

Star Rajkummar Rao(Vikram Jaisingh). Sanya Malhotra(Neha Mehta). Akhil Iyer(Rohit). Jatin Goswami(Akshay). Shilpa Shukla(Sheela). Milind Gunaji(SI Ibrahim Sheikh). Nuveksha(Sapna – Rohit’s Wife). Rose Khan(Preeti Mathur). Dalip Tahil(Ajit Singh Shekhawat). Sanjay Narvekar(Srikant Saxena – Forensic Director). Avneet Singh(Manjeet – Forensic Expert). Hemraj Tiwari(Mohan Mathur). Shikha Pareek(Laxmi Mathur). Bhairavi Raichura(Sushmita). Geeta Sodhi(Saraswati – Orphanage Incharge). Parnalekha Mishra Paul(Eesha). J.P. Chopra(Dr. Jain – Narco Expert). Diptii Salvi(Young Sapna). Dishita Sehgal(Young Preeti). Noyrika Bhatheja(Dr. Ritika). Chinmaya Madan(Ajay – Preeti’s Boyfriend). Imran Syed(Bunty – Drug Dealer). Raviraj(Fahaad). Vinod Soni(Constable Laaduram). Vikas Prasad(Prof. Chandrashekhar Rathore). Lavina Sadhwani(Ekta – Preeti’s Collegemate). Madhur Arora(Aniruddh – Handwriting Analyst). Bhanu Bhaskar(SI Shiv Chauhan). Alisha Soni(Constable Lata Sharma). Rakesh Kumar(Sub-inspector Sharma). Vivan Negi(Young Vikram). Aparna Bajpai(Sameera Mathur). Umesh Pant(Inspector Saini). Dhanlaxmi Kapadia(Rohit’s Mother). Firuza Kharas(Neha’s Mother). Saurabh Shukla(Toll Plaza Employee). Tanu(Toll Plaza Employee). Sachin Hiralal(Masked Kidnapper at Manali). Laxmi Lamsal(Masked Kidnapper at Manali)

Language Hindi

Producer Shiv Chanana. Radhika Joshi. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Dil Raju. Kuldeep Rathore. Shiv Kumar Tiwari. S. Venkatarathnam

Production Dil Raju Productions. T-Series Films
